0.content:
## Kubernetes Pod & Team Runner Monitoring

**Active Teams:** cc-apa | cc-apc | cc-ghec | cc-cerberus | apa-runners  
**Pod Filters:** runner, actions

1.title: Total Pod Count (All Teams)
1.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| filter contains(entity.name, "runner") or contains(entity.name, "actions")
| summarize count()

2.title: cc-apa: Total Pods
2.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| filter contains(entity.name, "cc-apa")
| summarize count()

3.title: cc-apc: Total Pods
3.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| filter contains(entity.name, "cc-apc")
| summarize count()

4.title: cc-ghec: Total Pods
4.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| filter contains(entity.name, "cc-ghec")
| summarize count()

5.title: cc-cerberus: Total Pods
5.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| filter contains(entity.name, "cc-cerberus")
| summarize count()

6.title: apa-runners: Total Pods
6.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| filter contains(entity.name, "apa-runners")
| summarize count()

7.title: Team Distribution
7.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| filter contains(entity.name, "runner") or contains(entity.name, "actions")
| fieldsAdd team = if(contains(entity.name, "cc-apa"), "cc-apa", else:if(contains(entity.name, "cc-apc"), "cc-apc", else:if(contains(entity.name, "cc-ghec"), "cc-ghec", else:if(contains(entity.name, "cc-cerberus"), "cc-cerberus", else:if(contains(entity.name, "apa-runners"), "apa-runners", else:"other")))))
| summarize pod_count = count(), by:{team}

8.title: Pod Count by Team
8.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| filter contains(entity.name, "runner") or contains(entity.name, "actions")
| fieldsAdd team = if(contains(entity.name, "cc-apa"), "cc-apa", else:if(contains(entity.name, "cc-apc"), "cc-apc", else:if(contains(entity.name, "cc-ghec"), "cc-ghec", else:if(contains(entity.name, "cc-cerberus"), "cc-cerberus", else:if(contains(entity.name, "apa-runners"), "apa-runners", else:"other")))))
| summarize pod_count = count(), by:{team}
| sort pod_count desc

9.title: Pods by Team Comparison
9.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| filter contains(entity.name, "runner") or contains(entity.name, "actions")
| fieldsAdd team = if(contains(entity.name, "cc-apa"), "cc-apa", else:if(contains(entity.name, "cc-apc"), "cc-apc", else:if(contains(entity.name, "cc-ghec"), "cc-ghec", else:if(contains(entity.name, "cc-cerberus"), "cc-cerberus", else:if(contains(entity.name, "apa-runners"), "apa-runners", else:"other")))))
| summarize pod_count = count(), by:{team}
| sort pod_count desc

50.content:
---
### ðŸ“‹ Team Pod Details
Detailed pod listings for each team

10.title: cc-apa Pods
10.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| filter contains(entity.name, "cc-apa")
| fields pod_name = entity.name
| sort pod_name asc
| limit 100

11.title: cc-apc Pods
11.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| filter contains(entity.name, "cc-apc")
| fields pod_name = entity.name
| sort pod_name asc
| limit 100

12.title: cc-ghec Pods
12.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| filter contains(entity.name, "cc-ghec")
| fields pod_name = entity.name
| sort pod_name asc
| limit 100

13.title: cc-cerberus Pods
13.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| filter contains(entity.name, "cc-cerberus")
| fields pod_name = entity.name
| sort pod_name asc
| limit 100

14.title: apa-runners Pods
14.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| filter contains(entity.name, "apa-runners")
| fields pod_name = entity.name
| sort pod_name asc
| limit 100
